sentence: U.S. stock futures were practically unchanged Tuesday amid little economic indicators on tap and as retailers reported weaker than expected quarterly earnings.
E.T., Philadelphia Fed President Charles Plosser will speak on the economic outlook.
Earlier this month, Plosser suggested that the Fed could improve communication about the future path of the funds rate with "rules-based policies" such as variants of the Taylor rule.
Also, at 1:00 p.m., New York Fed President William Dudley will speak on the economic outlook and monetary policy.
In equities, Staples ( SPLS ) said Q1 earnings fell and warned that sales will decrease.
The stock was down over 10% in recent pre-market trade.
Home Depot ( HD ) was also lower by over 1% after missing Q1 expectations, although it raised its FY14 EPS guidance.
Dick's Sporting Goods ( DKS ) was meanwhile down by 14% on a Q1 miss and as it revised down its FY14 and Q2 guidance to below the street estimates.
Aeroflex ( ARX ) was at its highest level since May 2012, up nearly 25% before the market opened, as it agreed to be bought by Cobham PLC for $10.50 per share.
